title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - America's Power Grid | Kevin Garnett
itunes:title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - America's Power Grid | Kevin Garnett
description:
Desi Lydic reveals her most embarrassing tattoos, Trevor examines America's outdated and extremely vulnerable power grid, and NBA star Kevin Garnett discusses his memoir "KG A to Z."


To help Black people in need of access to culturally competent mental health care and to support Black therapists, go to dailyshow.com/FreeBlackTherapy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
